
{{alias}}( x, lambda )
    Computes the Box-Cox transformation.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    lambda: number
       Power parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    b: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 1.0, 2.5 )
    0.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 4.0, 2.5 )
    12.4
    > v = {{alias}}( 10.0, 2.5 )
    ~126.0911
    > v = {{alias}}( 2.0, 0.0 )
    ~0.6931
    > v = {{alias}}( -1.0, 2.5 )
    NaN
    > v = {{alias}}( 0.0, -1.0 )
    -Infinity

    See Also
    --------
